name: Pong Wars 2-Players
description:
This is a 2 player game. Each player gets 20% energy on every hit to use it for special moves.These are "accelaration of the ball" or "create a wall".

The Left Purple player uses:

-  W,A,S,D to move , 

- Q to create a wall and

- E to shoot.

The Right Green player uses: 

- Arrows to move,

-  ?(question mark) to create a wall and 

- Shift to shoot.

Use Ctrl and Scroll to adjust the field to your screen size!
